bibl.title: Language Change in Greek Loaned Verbs. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Examines the seemingly erratic use of the native auxiliary verb with verbs of Greek origin in a selection of fourth-century texts of the minor Coptic dialects.
bibl.seg: ALMOND Mathew, Language Change in Greek Loaned Verbs. Avec résumé en anglais.
Examines the seemingly erratic use of the native auxiliary verb with verbs of Greek origin in a selection of fourth-century texts of the minor Coptic dialects.
